title: Rick Rozoff and John Pilger
content:
Rozoff is an activist, anti-war supporter, Stop NATO web site editor.

He “document(s) and oppose(s) global militarist... <!--more--> trends and an expanding theater of war that began” by balkanizing Yugoslavia in the 1990s.

It expanded to South Asia.
It’s ravaging the Middle East, North Africa and Central Asia.

Major world and national issues will be discussed.

Pilger Pilger is an award-winning journalist, author, and documentary filmmaker.
He’s a former foreign and war correspondent.
 

A longtime critic of Western imperialism, he believes a “journalist’s job, first of all, (is) to look in the mirror of his own society” and report on it accurately.

Major world issues will be discussed.
